# label

**Instance Property**

An optional name that can help you identify the command queue.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set labels to help you quickly identify a GPU at runtime in the Metal debugging and profiling tools. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/Naming-resources-and-commands].

## Identifying the command queue

- **device**: The GPU device that creates the command queue.

items.description: The GPU device that creates the command queue.
